CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1939, pg. 9 reads: " "Happily Ever After" - Highlight in news last week in Duquesne, Pa., was the marriage of Johnnie Bell Lewis, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John Lewis Sr., to Robert Leonard.  The Rev. J.O. Edwards who read the single ring ceremony at the Patterson street home of the bride last Thursday night, prayed that the popular couple would "enjoy many years of happiness." - Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Bride Johnnie Bell Lewis Leonard wearing short sleeved gown with square neckline and mid length veil with pointed headpiece, and groom Robert Leonard wearing dark double breasted suit and light colored gloves, posed in front of floral arch
